57#include <openssl/evp.h>
58
59#include <openssl/digest.h>
60#include <openssl/err.h>
61
62#include "internal.h"
63
64
65int EVP_SignInit_ex(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const EVP_MD *type, ENGINE *impl) {
66 return EVP_DigestInit_ex(ctx, type, impl);
67}
68
69int EVP_SignInit(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const EVP_MD *type) {
70 return EVP_DigestInit(ctx, type);
71}
72
73int EVP_SignUpdate(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const void *data, size_t len) {
74 return EVP_DigestUpdate(ctx, data, len);
75}
76
77int EVP_SignFinal(const EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, uint8_t *sig,
78 unsigned int *out_sig_len, EVP_PKEY *pkey) {
79 uint8_t m[EVP_MAX_MD_SIZE];
80 unsigned int m_len;
81 int ret = 0;
82 EVP_MD_CTX tmp_ctx;
83 EVP_PKEY_CTX *pkctx = NULL;
84 size_t sig_len = EVP_PKEY_size(pkey);
85
86 *out_sig_len = 0;
87 EVP_MD_CTX_init(&tmp_ctx);
88 if (!EVP_MD_CTX_copy_ex(&tmp_ctx, ctx) ||
89 !EVP_DigestFinal_ex(&tmp_ctx, m, &m_len)) {
90 goto out;
91 }
92 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(&tmp_ctx);
93
94 pkctx = EVP_PKEY_CTX_new(pkey, NULL);
95 if (!pkctx || !EVP_PKEY_sign_init(pkctx) ||
96 !EVP_PKEY_CTX_set_signature_md(pkctx, ctx->digest) ||
97 !EVP_PKEY_sign(pkctx, sig, &sig_len, m, m_len)) {
98 goto out;
99 }
100 *out_sig_len = sig_len;
101 ret = 1;
102
103out:
104 if (pkctx) {
105 EVP_PKEY_CTX_free(pkctx);
106 }
107
108 return ret;
109}
110
111int EVP_VerifyInit_ex(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const EVP_MD *type, ENGINE *impl) {
112 return EVP_DigestInit_ex(ctx, type, impl);
113}
114
115int EVP_VerifyInit(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const EVP_MD *type) {
116 return EVP_DigestInit(ctx, type);
117}
118
119int EVP_VerifyUpdate(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const void *data, size_t len) {
120 return EVP_DigestUpdate(ctx, data, len);
121}
122
123int EVP_VerifyFinal(EVP_MD_CTX *ctx, const uint8_t *sig, size_t sig_len,
124 EVP_PKEY *pkey) {
125 uint8_t m[EVP_MAX_MD_SIZE];
126 unsigned int m_len;
127 int ret = 0;
128 EVP_MD_CTX tmp_ctx;
129 EVP_PKEY_CTX *pkctx = NULL;
130
131 EVP_MD_CTX_init(&tmp_ctx);
132 if (!EVP_MD_CTX_copy_ex(&tmp_ctx, ctx) ||
133 !EVP_DigestFinal_ex(&tmp_ctx, m, &m_len)) {
134 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(&tmp_ctx);
135 goto out;
136 }
137 EVP_MD_CTX_cleanup(&tmp_ctx);
138
139 pkctx = EVP_PKEY_CTX_new(pkey, NULL);
140 if (!pkctx ||
141 !EVP_PKEY_verify_init(pkctx) ||
142 !EVP_PKEY_CTX_set_signature_md(pkctx, ctx->digest)) {
143 goto out;
144 }
145 ret = EVP_PKEY_verify(pkctx, sig, sig_len, m, m_len);
146
147out:
148 EVP_PKEY_CTX_free(pkctx);
149 return ret;
150}
